author: Lon.TV
description:
See more like this : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsJJ0Gy1ENvGjbCp7PslRyz - Comcast/Xfinity announced last week that they are getting rid of data caps and moving to nationwide Internet pricing as competitive pressure grows. But you will need to call and they're still playing games with their price lock guarantees. See ISP reviews: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=znJaHo9oqyQ&list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsDHLqVf4Yd622YiRY0aYRJ and Subscribe for more! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:32 - Background on Data caps
01:28 - Competiton is Good!
02:37 - Comcast's New Rates
02:53 - How to get the new rate - 1 or 5 year?
04:13 - Discount Bundling
05:21 - Pricing vs. Fiber Providers
06:59 - Conclusion

title: No More Data Caps on Comcast / Xfinity! But you gotta call..
